description: This file is an HTML webpage that provides a user interface for a database visualizer. It includes embedded CSS styling and JavaScript code to fetch, display, and interact with database and table data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases from the server and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of available databases by re-fetching the data.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a specific database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it in a tabular format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML to display table data, handling wide content and nested objects.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual cell content, handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better readability.
